! Kartia Researcher: Labyrinth Kartia flooded with demons. They have three leader, intending to get in our world. You need to prevent the invasion. However, they are intangible beings from another measurement, so destroy them completely will not succeed. But we may hinder the plans the demons. Eliminate the Embodiment of jealousy Felline and its henchmen in the Maze of Kartia. [Quest _498_IncarnationOfJealousyPellineSolo 33647-3.htm|Ask whether you can do it alone]
